reviews.review: Very, very Entertaining however...... also very very silly. The characters are acted well and the main issue is the actual plot, it's absurd. i enjoyed it but wow something better could've been done, haha thanos goal is total nonsense to me and even if possible still makes no sense how it's accomplished and on who/what
Best to watch in ImaX awesome movie ?? can't wait ?? to watch it again this weekend for a second time.

The film handles is ambitious cast-size remarkably well, and due to the careful crafting of the universe beforehand each character really feels as if they belong and are integral to the story, every moment of this movie carries a weight that feels daunting, it really is unpreceted for a movie to feel this big, This movie has fully lived up to its potential as a spectacle of film. A remarkable feat. While it settles for actions and spectacle over more somber character-driven moments, what is there (Thanos is a remarkable villian) is enough to compel you go forward, and to await the conclusion next summer.
It was great just like everyone is saying it is

Three days removed from seeing this film and I am still amazed. The difficulty of balancing all of the characters in one movie was accomplished, seemingly with ease, to create an exciting, emotional, compelling, beautiful superhero movie, with a brilliant musical score, amazing special effects, wonderful story, great performances, unexpected moments, heavy hitting scenes, and tremendous action sequences. Is there anything else you could want in a superhero movie? I was glued to the screen from start to finish and I cannot wait to see what comes next.
Awesome, mind blowing, lives up to the hype!  Best Avengers film yet.  The powers that be at Disney Star Wars need to take notes from those in charge of Marvel.

A gargantuan monstrosity of pop culture that succeeds by being just dark and different enough to set itself far from the pack, even if the focus wavers in unfortunate directions and some subplots seem to be unfinished. Would it work better as a whole with the sequel?
worth every second of the 10 year build up.  loved it
